article_title: On Everest, Quake-Triggered Avalanche Leaves Death, Chaos : The Two-Way : NPR

article_metadata.description: Early reports are that at least eight climbers and/or Sherpas have been killed at Everest Base Camp. Others are trapped higher up on the world's tallest peak.

og.description: Early reports are that at least eight climbers and/or Sherpas have been killed at Everest Base Camp. Others are trapped higher up on the world's tallest peak.
